newsitem.title: USA: Accelr8 Technology Corp Q2 Jan 31 decreases.
newsitem.headline: Accelr8 Technology Corp Q2 Jan 31 decreases.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
NOTE: The company was not available to comment on its results for the first six months of either 1997 or 1996, or on the earnings per share for the second quater of 1996.
